solution_line_template: The first three cash prizes sum to ${first_prize} + ${second_prize} + ${third_prize}= $<<{first_prize}+{second_prize}+{third_prize}={sum_top_three}>>{sum_top_three}
The remaining amount of cash prizes to be distributed is ${total_prize} - ${sum_top_three}= $<<{total_prize}-{sum_top_three}={remaining_prize}>>{remaining_prize}
The number of novels left to be awarded is {total_awards} - {top_three_awards}= <<{total_awards}-{top_three_awards}={remaining_awards}>>{remaining_awards} novels
So each writer from 4th to 18th will earn ${remaining_prize} / {remaining_awards}= $<<{remaining_prize}/{remaining_awards}={per_writer_award}>>{per_writer_award}
